sentence.Network_en: All their songs have a lingering potency.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们所有的歌曲都有耐人寻味的魅力。
痛苦而拖延时日的死亡

sentence.Network_en: Unemployment and lingering disease cooperated to make his family broken.
sentence.Network_cn: 失业加上长期的疾病,使他倾家荡产.

entry.def: When something such as an idea, feeling, or illness lingers, it continues to exist for a long time, often much longer than expected.

example.ex: The scent of her perfume lingered on in the room...
example.tran: 她的香水味道在房间里久久不散。

example.ex: A guerrilla war has lingered into its fourth decade...
example.tran: 一场游击战已经持续了30多年。

entry.tran: 留恋；不愿离开；继续逗留
entry.def: If you linger somewhere, you stay there for a longer time than is necessary, for example because you are enjoying yourself.

example.ex: Customers are welcome to linger over coffee until around midnight...
example.tran: 客人尽可以喝着咖啡逗留到午夜左右。

example.ex: I lingered on in Atlanta for a few days, spending much of my time with an artist friend...
example.tran: 我在亚特兰大又逗留了几天，大部分时候都和一位搞艺术的朋友在一起。

auth_sentence.content: There have been lingering questions about Mubarak's health.
auth_sentence.res_content: There have been lingering questions about Mubarak's health.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There have been lingering questions about Mubarak's health.

auth_sentence.content: I believed I was endangering them just by lingering.
auth_sentence.res_content: I believed I was endangering them just by lingering.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I believed I was endangering them just by lingering.

auth_sentence.content: The lingering problem, though, was the ending.
auth_sentence.res_content: The lingering problem, though, was the ending.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The lingering problem, though, was the ending.

Sentence.sentence: Although most people admitted to some lingering rivalry, it was rarely strong enough to end the relationship.
About one eighth of them admitted to lingering bitter feelings
Lingering racism If the Obama effect is positive for African Americans, how is it affecting their white compatriots (同胞)

sentences.en: These figures kill off any lingering hopes of an early economic recovery.
sentences.cn: 这些数字彻底扼杀了人们对经济早日复苏所抱的一线希望。

sentences.en: Unemployment and lingering disease cooperated to make his family broken.
sentences.cn: 失业加上长期的疾病,使他倾家荡产。
